        public void onHttpRequestCompleted(ApiJSON answer,
                                   int type)
        Started when the HTTP request has finished and succeeded. It then updates the views of the fragment in order to show profile information.
        Specified by:
        onHttpRequestCompleted in interface HttpRequest
        Parameters:

      • onPriceDialogCallBack

        public void onPriceDialogCallBack(int value,
                                  boolean isFinal,
                                  ProfileFragment.PriceType type)
        Started when the price dialog is dismissed. Then it sends a POST request to store the new professional data.
        Specified by:
        onPriceDialogCallBack in interface DialogCallback
        Parameters:
        value - Professional rate.
        isFinal - Whether the price is final.
        type - The type of the service.
